title: i had riot kayle and i didint get the free skin
body: I had riot kayle before the new gifting thing that riot did and all I got was the icon. my friend said that if we already had riot kayle then we would get a random skin. is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: I got my free skin today- Knockout Lee Sin. Just be patient they will come, and if they don't just send a ticket.

The gifts are being sent out individually per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  It will take s bit of time to get this all wrapped up.  There are a lot of eligible players so hang tight!
Yeah, on my account I had Riot Kayle before when she first came out and then got the icon. Still no other free skin, what gives Rito? D:
I don't even have the icon and I bought riot kayle when she came out to

The gifts are being sent to each player separately, so it's normal to receive one before receiving the other. Just hang tight as the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you don't receive all the gifts by then, you can submit a support ticket.
its cuz u arent king of games :/
I had Riot Kayle but I haven't even got the icon yet.
